labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Raindrop" is designed for bookmark management, allowing users to add, search, and organize bookmarks across various categories like articles, songs, and more. It provides tools for adding new bookmarks with metadata (URL, title, description, tags, and collection grouping), as well as searching bookmarks by tags or keywords with optional date filtering. The core functionality revolves around organizing and retrieving web content in a centralized manner.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Memory Management" is chosen because the server's core functionality involves storing, organizing, and retrieving bookmarks, which aligns with data storage and knowledge management. "Web Search & Research" is added as a secondary label due to its search capabilities, while "File Management" is included to reflect the organization of bookmarks into collections (similar to folder/file structures).

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Raindrop
server_info_crawled.author: @sachin-philip/raindrop-io-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Manage your bookmarks effortlessly. Add, search, and organize your favorite articles, songs, and more with ease using our powerful MCP server. Enhance your browsing experience by keeping everything in one place.

tools.name: get_latest_feed
tools.description: Deploy Server @sachin-philip/raindrop-io-mcp Try in Playground get_latest_feed

tools.name: add_bookmark
tools.description: Add a new bookmark to Raindrop.io Args: url: The URL to bookmark (required) title: Title for the bookmark (optional, will be extracted from URL if not provided) description: Description/excerpt for the bookmark (optional) tags: List of tags to apply to the bookmark (optional) collection_id: ID of the collection to add the bookmark to (default: 0 for Unsorted)

tools.name: search_by_tag
tools.description: Search for bookmarks with a specific tag in Raindrop.io with optional date range filtering Args: tag: The tag to search for (required) collection_id: ID of the collection to search in (default: 0 for all collections) count: Maximum number of bookmarks to return (default: 10) from_date: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional) to_date: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

tools.name: search_bookmarks
tools.description: Search for bookmarks by keyword/text in Raindrop.io with optional date range filtering Args: query: The search term to look for in bookmarks (required) collection_id: ID of the collection to search in (default: 0 for all collections) count: Maximum number of bookmarks to return (default: 10) from_date: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional) to_date: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@sachin-philip/raindrop-io-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: raindropToken
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: API token to authenticate with Raindrop.io, see https://developer.raindrop.io/v1/authentication/token
